0x00000000 - 0x00100000 = Reserved
0x00100000 - 0x00200000 = Unused
0x00200000 - 0x00300000 = Unused
0x00300000 - 0x00400000 = Unused
0x00400000 - 0x00500000 = OS Binary
0x00500000 - 0x00600000 = OS Binary
0x00600000 - 0x00700000 = Unused
0x00700000 - 0x00800000 = Unused
0x00800000 - 0x00900000 = Unused
0x00900000 - 0x00A00000 = Unused
0x00A00000 - 0x00B00000 = Unused
0x00B00000 - 0x00C00000 = Unused
0x00C00000 - 0x00D00000 = Unused
0x00D00000 - 0x00E00000 = Unused
0x00E00000 - 0x00F00000 = Unused
0x00F00000 - 0x01000000 = Unused
0x01000000 - 0x01100000 = Page Table
0x01100000 - 0x01200000 = Page Table
0x01200000 - 0x01300000 = Page Table
0x01300000 - 0x01400000 = Page Table
0x01400000 - 0x01500000 =
	0x01400000 - 0x01401000 = Page Directory
	0x01401000 - 0x01410000 = GDT Table
	0x01410000 - 0x01420000 = IDT Table
	0x01420000 - 0x01430000 = Unused
	0x01430000 - 0x01440000 = Unused
	0x01440000 - 0x01450000 = Unused
	0x01450000 - 0x01460000 = Unused
	0x01460000 - 0x01470000 = Unused
	0x01470000 - 0x01480000 = Unused
	0x01480000 - 0x01490000 = Unused
	0x01490000 - 0x014A0000 = Unused
	0x014A0000 - 0x014B0000 = Unused
	0x014B0000 - 0x014C0000 = Unused
	0x014C0000 - 0x014D0000 = Unused
	0x014D0000 - 0x014E0000 = Unused
	0x014E0000 - 0x014F0000 = Unused
	0x014F0000 - 0x01500000 = Unused
0x01500000 - 0x01600000 = Virtual Page Allocator
0x01600000 - 0x01700000 = Virtual Page Allocator
0x01700000 - 0x01800000 = Virtual Page Allocator
0x01800000 - 0x01900000 = Virtual Page Allocator
0x01900000 - 0x01A00000 = Unused
0x01A00000 - 0x01B00000 = Unused
0x01B00000 - 0x01C00000 = Unused
0x01C00000 - 0x01D00000 = Page Frame Allocator
0x01D00000 - 0x01E00000 = Page Frame Allocator
0x01E00000 - 0x01F00000 = Page Frame Allocator
0x01F00000 - 0x02000000 = Page Frame Allocator
